name: SRunner
description:
SRunner is an endless Speedrun platformer.  Your goal is to open all doors and leave the level as fast as possible.

My PB time is 130s. Can you beat it?

Controls

  • WSAD - Movement
  • Ctrl - Sliding
  • Space - Jumping

Credits

  • Theme 1 - Evan King
  • Theme 2 - Evan King
  • Theme 3 - Aries Beats
